/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/command_publisher.dir/src/command_publisher.cpp.o CMakeFiles/command_publisher.dir/src/speech_recognizer.c.o CMakeFiles/command_publisher.dir/src/linuxrec.c.o  -o /home/hans/ROS-wheeled-robot-master/melodic/devel/lib/sound_control/command_publisher -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/melodic/lib /opt/ros/melodic/lib/libroscpp.so -lboost_filesystem -lboost_signals /opt/ros/melodic/lib/librosconsole.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/librosconsole_log4cxx.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/librosconsole_backend_interface.so -llog4cxx -lboost_regex /opt/ros/melodic/lib/libxmlrpcpp.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/libroscpp_serialization.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/librostime.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/libcpp_common.so -lboost_system -lboost_thread -lboost_chrono -lboost_date_time -lboost_atomic -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libconsole_bridge.so.0.4 -lmsc -ldl -lpthread -lm -lrt -lasound
